Auckland double murderer Mikaere Puata-Chaney appears in behind-bars Instagram account https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-double-murderer-mikaere-puata-chaney-appears-in-behind-bars-instagram-account/YGBYVEJQ5ZHIBDOCMNDNS46PJU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-double-murderer-mikaere-puata-chaney-appears-in-behind-bars-instagram-account/YGBYVEJQ5ZHIBDOCMNDNS46PJU/ George BlockAnd he's not the only Head Hunter posting from behind bars.
